data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Santa Bárbara.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Santa Bárbara, Honduras
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 320,366 cultural Christians in the state of Santa Bárbara to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Santa Bárbara that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 129,027 believers in Santa Bárbara to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Turk people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Santa Bárbara.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Santa Bárbara, Honduras.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Santa Bárbara, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

location.name: Santa Bárbara
location.cities_list: Santa Bárbara, Las Vegas, Santa Barbara, Azacualpa, San Luis, Trinidad
